text:
Message 1361 of 4024
Whoa!!! Wait please don’t do that!!!!
Please at least call me. Can we talk!
Do you have a Valentine’s date?
Sent:02/13/2024 at 12:55 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/13/2024 at 02:41 PM)
Subject:Re: Our Chat
Message 1362 of 4024
So.. you pinged Anna Lisa, Anna Lisa looks like she pinged Lisa, Lisa definitely pinged me and now everyone wants a signature on the same RO that
was sent a long while ago.
Obviously, a week back you said: "Communications - can you propose something that you feel is more appropriate. I’m concerned about calls or
emails and texts as it is demonstrated they have been ugly, tone is confrontational, scary etc. nothing in recent history demonstrates that will change. I
am open to your suggestion."
I hope that the offer still stands. AND I hope I have shown a trend toward cooperation and peace, communicating in a way that puts you at ease. My
suggested updates to the RO are still valid and will afford us to be much more effective than the current way (which has me re-sending this mail from
ten days back). I hope you can see that.
So appreciate the continued partnership here. It is so much nicer than living in a bomb shelter. Just let me know if we are going to follow through on
the suggestions you requested of me, and we can ask for an update and be done with this mess!
Hope your day is going well....
Sent:02/13/2024 at 02:14 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/13/2024 at 02:41 PM)
Subject:Re: Domestic Abuse
Message 1363 of 4024
Can you share a list of O/S items?
I did not see you respond to Dr. Brown for date for your session but maybe I missed it.
I have a date with the boys and the EY Japan team.
Sent:02/13/2024 at 02:45 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/13/2024 at 02:47 PM)
Subject:Re: Our Chat
